sources:
Definition of base
        // has to precede definition of derived contract

I1.sol.content:
// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0
pragma solidity *; import {I4} from 'I4.sol'; interface I1 {}

I2.sol.content:
// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0
pragma solidity *; import {I1} from 'I1.sol'; interface I2 is I1 {}

I3.sol.content:
// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0
pragma solidity *; import {I2} from 'I2.sol'; interface I3 {}

I4.sol.content:
// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0
pragma solidity *; import {S}  from 'S.sol';  interface I4 {}

S.sol.content:
// SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0
pragma solidity *; import {I3} from 'I3.sol'; struct    S  { uint x; }
